scripts.reinstall: for i in $(echo application-configuration cache data-access logging security services); do rm -rf node_modules/$i ; done && npm install
scripts.linklibs: workingDirectory="$(pwd)" && for libraryName in $(echo application-configuration cache data-access error logging services); do rm -rf $workingDirectory/node_modules/$libraryName && ln -s $workingDirectory/../$libraryName node_modules/$libraryName ; done
